QuestData.Title: Open for Business
QuestData.Description: Welcome, $n.$b$bThere are a number of ways I can assist you in your efforts here.$b$bFor example, I've recently discovered a recipe for a unique elixir.$b$bThe bloodberry grows wild in many regions of Azeroth and has long been considered nothing more than a nuisance. I've learned though, that when exposed to the Sunwell's power this plant takes on special properties that can be distilled and imbibed to magnify one's abilites.$b$bBring me a sample from the nearby bushes and I'll show you what I mean.
QuestData.LogDescription: Mar'nah at the Sun's Reach Harbor wants you to gather 5 Bloodberries from the bushes found on Quel'Danas.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you gathered those berries yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent, $n.$b$bI hope this will aid you in your efforts here.
